Fee Schedule

fee-schedule.Rmd
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
library(qs)

Look Up HCPCS Code 

calc_amounts_df(hcpcs    = "11646", 
                state    = "GA", 
                locality = "99", 
                mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 48
#> $ hcpcs       <chr> "11646"
#> $ description <chr> "Exc f/e/e/n/l mal+mrg >4 cm"
#> $ mod         <chr> "00"
#> $ status      <chr> "A"
#> $ mac         <chr> "10212"
#> $ state       <fct> GA
#> $ locality    <chr> "99"
#> $ area        <chr> "REST OF GEORGIA"
#> $ counties    <chr> "ALL OTHER COUNTIES"
#> $ two_macs    <lgl> FALSE
#> $ wgpci       <dbl> 1
#> $ pgpci       <dbl> 0.883
#> $ mgpci       <dbl> 1.125
#> $ wrvu        <dbl> 6.26
#> $ nprvu       <dbl> 7.92
#> $ fprvu       <dbl> 4.36
#> $ mrvu        <dbl> 0.99
#> $ cf          <dbl> 32.744

#> $ nlim        <dbl> 513.952
#> $ opps        <chr> "0"

#> $ mrvu_opps   <dbl> 0
#> $ fprvu_opps  <dbl> 0
#> $ mult_surg   <chr> "0"

#> $ op_intra    <dbl> 0.8
#> $ op_post     <dbl> 0.1

#> $ surg_asst   <int> 1
#> $ surg_co     <int> 0
#> $ surg_team   <int> 0

#> $ unused      <int> 0

Physician Fee Schedule Amount Calculation


\(RVU_w\) Work Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_w\) Work Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(RVU_p\) Practice Expense Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_p\) Practice Expense Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(RVU_m\) Malpractice Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_m\) Malpractice Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(CF\) Conversion Factor


The Participating amount is calculated as follows:



\[x = [(RVU_w \times GPCI_w) + (RVU_p \times GPCI_p) + (RVU_m \times GPCI_m)] \times CF\]


The Non-participating amount is calculated as follows:


\[ y = 0.95x\]


The Limiting charge is calculated as follows:


\[ z = 0.95(1.15x)\]


calc_amounts(wrvu  = 6.26,
             nprvu = 7.92,
             fprvu = 4.36,
             mrvu  = 0.99,
             cf    = 32.744,
             wgpci = 1,
             pgpci = 0.883,
             mgpci = 1.125)
#> Facility:
#> Participating Amount    = $367.51
#> Non-Particpating Amount = $349.13
#> Limiting Charge         = $401.50
#> 
#> Non-Facility:
#> Participating Amount    = $470.44
#> Non-Particpating Amount = $446.91
#> Limiting Charge         = $513.95

Data Sources 

rvu(hcpcs = "11646") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 28
#> $ hcpcs       <chr> "11646"
#> $ description <chr> "Exc f/e/e/n/l mal+mrg >4 cm"
#> $ mod         <chr> "00"
#> $ status      <chr> "A"
#> $ wrvu        <dbl> 6.26
#> $ nprvu       <dbl> 7.92
#> $ fprvu       <dbl> 4.36
#> $ mrvu        <dbl> 0.99
#> $ cf          <dbl> 32.744
#> $ nprvu_opps  <dbl> 0
#> $ fprvu_opps  <dbl> 0
#> $ mrvu_opps   <dbl> 0
#> $ global      <chr> "010"
#> $ op_ind      <dbl> 1
#> $ op_pre      <dbl> 0.1
#> $ op_intra    <dbl> 0.8
#> $ op_post     <dbl> 0.1
#> $ pctc        <chr> "0"
#> $ mult_proc   <int> 2
#> $ surg_bilat  <int> 0
#> $ surg_asst   <int> 1
#> $ surg_co     <int> 0
#> $ surg_team   <int> 0

#> $ supvis      <chr> "09"

gpci(state    = "GA",
     locality = "99",
     mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 9
#> $ mac      <chr> "10212"
#> $ state    <fct> GA
#> $ locality <chr> "99"
#> $ name     <chr> "REST OF GEORGIA"
#> $ wgpci    <dbl> 1
#> $ pgpci    <dbl> 0.883
#> $ mgpci    <dbl> 1.125
#> $ counties <chr> "ALL OTHER COUNTIES"
#> $ two_macs <lgl> FALSE
pfs(hcpcs    = "11646", 
    locality = "99",
    mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 10
#> $ mac       <chr> "10212"
#> $ locality  <chr> "99"
#> $ hcpcs     <chr> "11646"
#> $ mod       <chr> "00"
#> $ status    <chr> "A"
#> $ mult_surg <chr> "0"
#> $ flat_vis  <dbl> 0
#> $ ntherapy  <dbl> 2
#> $ ftherapy  <dbl> 0
#> $ opps      <chr> "0"
hcpcs() |> 
  filter(hcpcs == "V5299") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 35
#> $ hcpcs             <chr> "V5299"
#> $ type              <chr> "code"
#> $ seqnum            <chr> "0010"
#> $ recid             <chr> "3"
#> $ long_description  <chr> "Hearing service, miscellaneous"
#> $ short_description <chr> "Hearing service"
#> $ price1            <chr> "13"
#> $ price2            <chr> NA
#> $ mult_pi           <chr> "A"
#> $ cim1              <chr> NA
#> $ cim2              <chr> NA
#> $ mcm1              <chr> "2320"
#> $ mcm2              <chr> NA
#> $ mcm3              <chr> NA

#> $ labcert1          <chr> NA
#> $ labcert2          <chr> NA
#> $ labcert3          <chr> NA
#> $ labcert4          <chr> NA

#> $ xref2             <chr> NA

#> $ tos2              <chr> NA
#> $ tos3              <chr> NA
#> $ tos4              <chr> NA

#> $ act_eff_dt        <date> 1995-01-01

#> $ action_cd         <chr> "N"
cpt_descriptors() |> 
  filter(cpt == "11646") |> 
  select(-clinician_descriptor) |>
  distinct() |>
  unlist()
#>                                                                                            cpt 
#>                                                                                        "11646" 
#>                                                                            consumer_descriptor 
#> "Removal of cancer skin growth of face, ears, eyelids, nose, lips, or mouth, more than 4.0 cm"
